General.Name: Doosan Fuel Cell Co Ltd
General.Description: Doosan Fuel Cell Co., Ltd. develops and distributes power generation fuel cells in South Korea. The company supplies fuel cell that produces stationery fuel cells of 440KW. It also develops, manufactures, and sells facilities, which includes relates installations and maintenance services. Doosan Fuel Cell Co. Ltd has a license agreement with Ceres Power Limited. The company was incorporated in 2019 and is headquartered in Iksan-si, South Korea.
